EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Account} Relocation Quote {!Opportunity.Manual_Quote_Number__c}

Hello {!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.Contact__c},
We're working to get pricing and freight requirements collected (if applicable) for a requested relocation service. To ensure we best support the relocation requirements, please complete the Relocation Requirements Form({!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.External_Site_Link__c}). Use this security passcode to access the form: [{!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.Pass_Key__c}].
Thank you for your timely response.
